nodes.text: The Eeropha system was a star system in the Colonies. It contained the planet Eeropha and its seven moons, including Nierport VII. During the final decades of the Galactic Republic Eeropha and Nierport VII served as refueling stops for starships traveling to Coruscant along the Hydian Way, and during the Separatist Crisis Eeropha was represented in the Galactic Senate by Senator Sano Sauro.
